elements.text: Periodic reminder to comment and upvote on the Julia for kaggle request (if you plan to use such a capability)
Would be nice to get 79 more upvotes to make it the most upvoted product feedback.

text: I really think people shouldn’t be upvoting  this if they have no intention of using Kaggle.

elements.text: I really think people shouldn’t be upvoting  this if they have no intention of using Kaggle.

text: I hear you but I think it will create demand. I'm sure there will be other people who will discover julia through kaggle or users not represented here.

elements.text: I hear you but I think it will create demand. I'm sure there will be other people who will discover julia through kaggle or users not represented here.

text: Like most, I think kaggle underestimates Julia's utility and community size

elements.text: Like most, I think kaggle underestimates Julia's utility and community size

text: IMO, petitioning a company to provide a service you don't plan on using is pretty dishonest, and will likely just lead to that company not listening to petitions

elements.text: IMO, petitioning a company to provide a service you don't plan on using is pretty dishonest, and will likely just lead to that company not listening to petitions

text: I get that you have good intentions here both for them and for the julia community, but I think we need to be careful about not draining people's resources just because it'd look good for julia

elements.text: I get that you have good intentions here both for them and for the julia community, but I think we need to be careful about not draining people's resources just because it'd look good for julia

text: I would totally use it though. I even used Julia for a Kaggle competition using the “hack” through a Python notebook. They do have the repo for Julia support updated it is just not lived since when they offered it many years ago it didn’t have much usage.

elements.text: I would totally use it though. I even used Julia for a Kaggle competition using the “hack” through a Python notebook. They do have the repo for Julia support updated it is just not lived since when they offered it many years ago it didn’t have much usage.

text: That's totally fair and you should definitely petition them! I just wanted to make a note for people who are *not* planning to use Kaggle.

elements.text: That's totally fair and you should definitely petition them! I just wanted to make a note for people who are

text: Ok, I agree. To be honest, the upvote thing didn't feel like such a formal request so I  didn't quite think it through. Also my bias tends to skew zealous for Julia. Anyway,  personally  I do plan on using it.

elements.text: Ok, I agree. To be honest, the upvote thing didn't feel like such a formal request so I  didn't quite think it through. Also my bias tends to skew zealous for Julia. Anyway,  personally  I do plan on using it.
